summary: Adds Legolas' Bow to the game.
descriptionHtml:
[b]No replacers, no new models.[/b]

Adds Legolas' Mirkwood bow to the game, it has a base attack of 25 and a weight of 4 meaning its lightwight, it also has the same speed as a dagger so you can fire as quick as Legolas! I tried making the bow fire 2 arrows at once but the game didn't like it so i left it out!

The bow can be found underneath a bed at the Inn in Riverwood.
author: GoodfellowGoodspring
